description.p: The *[xb:TableQuery::ExecuteResult]* class is used with Alpha Anywhere SQL connection drivers to provide intermediate information about the result of the operation.

property.name: lastInsertedIdentity
property.description: The identity for the last row of data inserted into the table. This value is only available if *[xb:hasLastInsertedIdentity]* is *[xb:.t.]*.

property.name: rowsAffected
property.description: The number of rows affected by the last operation on the table.

property.name: tableInfo
property.description: Information about the table that was affected by the SQL operation.
